CustomField.description: The value in this field will be "Inside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [Set Up Employer Contributions] is blank AND NOW() is less than or equal to the [ER Benefits Setup (W) Target Time] The value in this field will be "Outside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [Set Up Employer Contributions] is blank AND NOW() is greater than the [ER Benefits Setup (W) Target Time]
CustomField.label: ER Benefits Setup (W) SLA
